description:
Shinsuke plans to attack a local group of brigands, only to be beaten to the bunch by the eccentric Tama and Jinka. Impressed by their prowess in battle, Shinsuke becomes determined to follow them, and offers to take them to the brigands` leader.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Faire le bien en ces temps incertains
We Are Those Who Lament This Barbaric Age
